text.name: bh_eggsMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more eggs per animal per game hour, set '0' to disable the mod. (NOTE: You need to restart your savegame to apply after any change).

text.name: bh_woolMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more wool per animal per game hour, set '0' to disable the mod. (NOTE: You need to restart your savegame to apply after any change).

text.name: bh_milkMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more milk per animal per game hour, set '0' to disable the mod. (NOTE: You need to restart your savegame to apply after any change).

text.name: bh_manureMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more manure per animal per game hour, set '0' to disable the mod. (NOTE: You need to restart your savegame to apply after any change).

text.name: bh_slurryMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more slurry per animal per game hour, set '0' to disable the mod. (NOTE: You need to restart your savegame to apply after any change).

text.name: bh_blink_warn
text.text:
Warning: Some animal(s) production multiplier has been updated.
::: You must restart your savegame to apply the changes.. :::
